channel.title: Stalls
channel.description: Hey guys im using hybrid pvp v3 and i had wanted to add a time to the stalls so you couldnt mass click and havea full inv of items instantly, i had wanted to add a timer and/or a random question every random amount of time, Thanks!

item.title: Stalls
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

find something like this in your server:

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

to add a wait time youâ€™re going to have to add the

and the

actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
in the areas as shown above

Read full topic
